00042 bool uvm_ml_phase::first_runtime_call = false;

00058 
00091 int uvm_ml_phase::transmit_phase(int                 target_id,
00092                                  const char *        phase_group,
00093                                  const char *        phase_name,
00094                                  uvm_ml_phase_action phase_action)
00095 {
00096     uvm_common_schedule * pschedule = get_schedule(phase_group);
00097     uvm_phase_state       state     = get_phase_state(phase_action);
00098     sc_core::sc_module  * pmod      = NULL;
00099     //int                   result    = 1;
00100 
00101     if (uvm_ml_utils::is_tree_node_quasi_static(target_id) == false)
00102         return 1;
00103 
00104     if (is_phase_supported(phase_group, phase_name) == false)
00105         return 1;
00106 
00107     if (strcmp(phase_name,"resolve_bindings") == 0)
00108        return 1;
00109 
00110     uvm_phase *pphase = pschedule->set_phase(phase_name, state);
00111     if (pphase == NULL)
00112         return 0;
00113 
00114     pmod   = uvm_ml_utils::get_quasi_static_tree_node_by_id(target_id);
00115     if(pmod == NULL) {
00116       cout << "UVM_SC adapter: transmit_phase failed, sub-tree not found" << endl;
00117       UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: transmit_phase failed, sub-tree not found","");
00118       return 0;
00119     };
00120     
00121     pphase->execute_nonruntime_phase(pmod);
00122 
00123     return 1;
00124 }   // transmit_phase()
00125 
00126 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00128 
00146 int uvm_ml_phase::notify_phase(const char *        phase_group,
00147                                const char *        phase_name,
00148                                uvm_ml_phase_action phase_action)
00149 {
00150     uvm_common_schedule * pschedule = get_schedule(phase_group);
00151     uvm_phase_state       state     = get_phase_state(phase_action);
00152     int                   result    = 1;
00153 
00154     if (is_phase_supported(phase_group, phase_name) == false)
00155         return 1;
00156 
00157     result = pschedule->execute_quasi_static_phase(phase_name, state);
00158 
00159     if (result && 
00160        (strcmp(phase_name, "connect") == 0)  &&
00161        (state == UVM_PHASE_ENDED) )
00162     {
00163         return uvm_ml_utils::do_pending_uvm_ml_connect_calls();
00164     }
00165 
00166     // Ensure 'end_of_simulation' is called after final phase completes
00167     if (result && 
00168        (strcmp(phase_name, "final") == 0)  &&
00169        (state == UVM_PHASE_ENDED) )
00170     {
00171         UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_END_OF_SIMULATION();
00172     }
00173 
00174     return result;
00175 
00176 }   // notify_phase()
00177 
00178 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00180 
00208 int uvm_ml_phase::notify_runtime_phase(const char *        phase_group,
00209                                        const char *        phase_name,
00210                                        uvm_ml_phase_action phase_action,
00211                                        uvm_ml_time_unit    time_unit,
00212                                        double              time_value,
00213                                        unsigned int *      participate)
00214 {
00215     ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00216 
00217     uvm_common_schedule * pschedule    = get_schedule(phase_group);
00218     uvm_phase_state       state        = get_phase_state(phase_action);
00219     int                   cosim_result = 1;
00220 
00221     (*participate) = 0;
00222 
00223 
00224     if (is_phase_supported(phase_group, phase_name) == false)
00225         return 1;
00226 
00227     uvm_phase *pphase = pschedule->set_phase(phase_name, state);
00228     if (pphase == NULL)
00229         return 0;
00230 
00231     // Upon first time entry to valid runtime notification, prepare to simulate
00232     if  (first_runtime_call == false)
00233     {
00234         first_runtime_call = true;
00235         try
00236         {
00237             QUASI_STATIC_PREPARE_TO_SIMULATE();
00238         }
00239 #ifndef UVM_ML_PORTABLE
00240         UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_PREPARE_TO_SIMULATE_ERR,0,0,0)
00241 #else
00242         catch(int)
00243         {
00244             return 0;
00245         }
00246 #endif
00247      }
00248 
00249     pphase->execute_runtime_phase();
00250 
00251     if (phase_action == UVM_ML_PHASE_EXECUTING)
00252     {
00253         cosim_result = CO_SIMULATION_EXECUTE_DELTA();
00254 
00255         if ((cosim_result == 0) || (pphase->barrier.get_num_barriers() > 0))
00256         {
00257             sc_spawn(sc_bind(&wait_barrier, pphase));
00258             (*participate) = 1;
00259             EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00260             return 1;
00261         }
00262     }
00263 
00264     EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00265     return 1;
00266 
00267 }   // notify_runtime_phase
00268

00272 
00282 void uvm_ml_phase::wait_barrier(uvm_phase* pphase)
00283 {
00284     sc_core::wait(SC_ZERO_TIME);
00285     pphase->barrier.wait();
00286 
00287     sc_core::sc_time current_time  = sc_core::sc_time_stamp();
00288     double           time_sec      = current_time.to_seconds();
00289     unsigned         framework_id  = uvm_ml_utils::FrameworkId();
00290     const char *     phase_name;
00291     const char *     phase_group;
00292 
00293     phase_name  = pphase->get_name().c_str();
00294     phase_group = pphase->get_schedule()->basename();
00295 
00296     (*m_bp_provided_api->notify_phase_done_ptr)(framework_id, phase_group, phase_name, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec);
00297     
00298 }   // wait_barrier()

00303 
00308 uvm_common_schedule* uvm_ml_phase::get_schedule(const char* phase_group)
00309 {
00310     uvm_common_schedule * pschedule_common = uvm::get_uvm_common_schedule();
00311     uvm_common_schedule * pschedule_uvm    = uvm::get_uvm_schedule();
00312 
00313     if (strcmp(phase_group, "common") == 0)
00314         return pschedule_common;
00315     else
00316         return pschedule_uvm;
00317 
00318 }   // get_schedule()

00323 
00331 bool uvm_ml_phase::is_phase_supported(const char* phase_group, const char*  phase_name)
00332 {
00333     bool bsupported = false;
00334 
00335     if ( (strcmp(phase_group, "common") == 0) &&
00336          ( (strcmp(phase_name, "build") == 0)               ||
00337            (strcmp(phase_name, "connect") == 0)             ||
00338            (strcmp(phase_name, "resolve_bindings") == 0)    ||
00339            (strcmp(phase_name, "end_of_elaboration") == 0)  ||
00340            (strcmp(phase_name, "start_of_simulation") == 0) ||
00341            (strcmp(phase_name, "run") == 0)                 ||
00342            (strcmp(phase_name, "extract") == 0)             ||
00343            (strcmp(phase_name, "check") == 0)               ||
00344            (strcmp(phase_name, "report") == 0)              ||
00345            (strcmp(phase_name, "final") == 0)) )
00346     {
00347         bsupported = true;
00348     }
00349     else if ( (strcmp(phase_group, "uvm") == 0) &&
00350               ( (strcmp(phase_name, "reset") == 0) ||
00351                 (strcmp(phase_name, "configure") == 0) ||
00352                 (strcmp(phase_name, "main") == 0) ||
00353                 (strcmp(phase_name, "shutdown") == 0)) )
00354     {
00355         bsupported = true;
00356     }
00357 
00358     return bsupported;
00359 
00360 }   // is_phase_supported()
00361 
00362 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00364 
00369 uvm_phase_state uvm_ml_phase::get_phase_state(uvm_ml_phase_action phase_action)
00370 {
00371     uvm_phase_state state;
00372 
00373     switch(phase_action)
00374     {
00375     case UVM_ML_PHASE_STARTED:
00376         state = uvm::UVM_PHASE_STARTED;
00377         break;
00378     case UVM_ML_PHASE_EXECUTING:
00379         state = uvm::UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING;
00380         break;
00381     case UVM_ML_PHASE_READY_TO_END:
00382         state = uvm::UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_END;
00383         break;
00384     case UVM_ML_PHASE_ENDED:
00385         state = uvm::UVM_PHASE_ENDED;
00386         break;
00387     default:
00388         break;
00389     };
00390 
00391     return state;
00392 
00393 }   // get_phase_state()
